unlocks.message:
Gems are personalized in multiple ways.
One of them is through listening.
unlocks.heading: PLAY PRODUCT 10 TIMES
unlocks.title: Streaming the album unlocks new Gem elements.

unlocks.message: Real-world interactions are also possible, like finding secret codes on hidden objects.
unlocks.heading: FOUND A HIDDEN OBJECT
unlocks.title: Finding the secret code on a hidden pool toy at Honest Jon's unlocks a rare element.

unlocks.message: Visiting storied locations with friends can unlock surprise Gem elements.
unlocks.heading: FOUND A SPECIAL LOCATION
unlocks.title: Walking down Heaven's alley with a friend unlocks a special element for both of you.

unlocks.message: Gems are a deeply personal way to tell the story of an artist and their album.
unlocks.title: And the more you explore that story, the more personal your Gem becomes.

unlocks.message:
Gems can take many forms.
Tap below to see a few more.
